_header: False Titlaris now grows up full rank
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘Aganis haisty Credence of Titlaris’ — seven 8-line stanzas with refrain phrase, ‘…credence’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
ffals Tutlaris now growis vp full rankNot Impit in þe stok of
                    chirrite…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…I say no moir bot gif god gif grit men graceThat
                    þai to sic gif no haiste g credence

Banna.First Lines:
ffals titlaris now growis vp full rankNocht ympit in the stok of
                    cheretie…
Banna.Last Lines:
…I say no moir bot god grant lordis graceTo gife to taillis
                    nocht hestely creddence
